Package nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp20.renderer

Class renderer

java.lang.Object
nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp20.renderer.renderer
public class renderer
extends java.lang.Object
The rendering module is responsible for providing a simple 2D view of the maze, to be embedded in the application. It should be updated after each move.
Author:
Phoenix Xie
